column2: Kuya: It's nice to finally meet you, Avatar Roku.
column3: Avatar Roku: I apologize for my actions. I was overcome by rage.
Avatar Roku: I was minding my own business in the spirit world when I heard some explosions nearby. I went to check it out and next thing I knew, I was here.

column2: Kuya: I'm sorry to hear there's trouble in the Spirit World. I'll take care of it. Avatar Aang has also found a way to reconnect you to the Avatar Spirit, if you don’t mind.
